body:
₪₪₪Customize a Rotation₪₪₪


I know I made a topic about this before but since then we have had many maps added and removed and a few map reassessments and the Omega update so there are many more Nebula maps to pick from so once again If you could use any map and create your own rotation, what maps would you want?

*You can only have a total of 15 maps in your list*
*Don't use the same map more than twice*
*Nebula maps ONLY*

♏y Rotation

1. Haunted Hollows
2. Justice III CTW
3. Sunbeam Temple
4. Rapture II
5. Rendezvous II CTW
6. The Hollow
7. Arizona
8. FFA
9. Zao I
10. Quintus
11. Rendezvous I
12. Sector Six
13. Sandstorm
14. Justice II
15. Ternio

Comment yours below :D
